"A.P.242/3/3 15:00": "Perfectly fine. In fact, now that I'm one Xiao lighter, I feel like I could fly."
"Hm? Ahh. I'm going to be stationed on Amduscia for a while."
"Xiao's real body is on Amduscia, and I am his kin after all. I'll be there as a sort of resident bodyguard."
"Will you be okay on your own? Won't it be lonely?"
"Could it be, Claris Claes is going too?"
"Right you are! I figured Sara would get lonely by herself, so I elected to join her!"
"Dumbass, like I'd ever get lonely. It's an important strategic location, so there oughta be a Council member there too."

"Taking her along is like asking for trouble to drop right on top of us. But, it's part of the mission, so
I'll just have to accept it."
